message: I've seen (but haven't used) Taskos, GTasks, and CheckItOff. I wanted to see if anyone had any great/bad experience with either of these?
Taskos all the way! Nice UI, widgets, etc GTasks was a trial last time I used it. Never used the third
Astrid actually integrates with google tasks and calendar. I love it
I prefer Google Tasks Organizer. It syncs up well with Google Tasks.
Agreed. Just downloaded Taskos, and it's so awesome. Thanks, @cym0n!
I've created an app called BHive Google Tasks - I think its the best one, but I'm biased ;)
